channel.title: MavensMate Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.29
item.description:
Version 0.29

This release brings many much-needed bug fixes

  • Deployment issue to production orgs has been resolved (#118) (thanks @britishboyindc)
  • Creating a new MavensMate project from an existing directory (inside or outside your workspace) is now much more stable (thanks @knthornt)
  • mm_client has been tweaked for performance, so you may experience faster API-related operations
  • Logging is now properly connected to plugin settings: "mm_log_location" and "mm_log_level"
  • Better validation for operations
  • Edit/Deploy project now more accurately displays project's selected metadata

MavensMate for Sublime Text has also been updated to 2.1.3, so be sure to run the update from MavensMate.app --> Plugins
